radiographic_examinations.findings: Massively enlarged thyroid extending superior to the floor of the mouth with encasement and narrowing of the right common artery, right internal carotid artery, and right internal jugular vein. Compression of the subglottic trachea to a diameter of 6 mm in transverse dimension.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the brain

radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe right carotid stenosis related to extrinsic compression by a mass surrounding the right common, internal, and external carotid arteries.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Carotid artery duplex examination and angiography
radiographic_examinations.findings: No significant flow-limiting lesion in the right carotid artery.
